title: Braunwyn Windham-Burke shares details on first threesome with husband and how it became tradition
text:
Braunwyn Windham-Burke shared details on her first threesome with her husband Sean and how it became a 'monumental birthday' tradition.

The 41-year-old reality star opened up on The Real Housewives Of Orange County After Show after making the revelation during a group trip to Mexico on the Bravo show.

'It started with his 35th birthday,' Braunwyn said referencing her 46-year-old husband Sean, according to an article Monday by the Daily Dish.

First threesome: Braunwyn Windham-Burke shared details about her first threesome with husband Sean during The Real Housewives Of Orange County After Show

A producer during her joint interview with Shannon Beador, 55, pressed for more details, but Braunwyn declined.

'Oh, no. I will never tell those stories,' said the mother of seven.

'I'm pretty sure it was before the Internet, so there's no photographic proof,' she added.

Braunwyn, however, when asked by Shannon confirmed that she knew the other woman beforehand and they still remain friends.

Reality star: The 41-year-old reality star, shown last week in Hollywood, made the threesome revelation during a group trip to Mexico on The Real Housewives Of Orange County

The producer then asked Braunwyn if the threesome was planned or spontaneous.

Braunwyn after a long pause replied, 'I think it was kind of assumed. Some things had been happening'.

She added that they were at the Hard Rock Hotel in San Diego for Sean's 35th birthday and rented out rooms for friends.

Family portrait: Braunwyn and Sean are shown with their seven children in July on Instagram

'Everyone lost their damn minds,' Braunwyn said.

Braunwyn noted that she and Sean have been together for a 'long time'.

'Everything we've done, we've done together. So it was sort of like, ''Oh, that would be fun.'' And I was kind of like, ''This is your birthday present.'' So it started as a joke,' she said.

Minds lost: The reality star said everyone at her husband's 35th birthday party 'lost their damn minds'

Joint interview: Shannon Beador was interviewed along with Braunwyn during the RHOC After Show

'And then it became, ''OK, for every monumental birthday, this will be your gift'',' she explained.

Shannon also found out that the other woman has been in a threesome with them more than once and lives in the 'other side of the country'.

Braunwyn also revealed she has not seen the woman in years.
description: The 41-year-old reality star shared details on her first threesome with her husband Sean and how it became a 'monumental birthday' tradition.
